'''1.21.8''' is a minor hotfix update for {{JE}} released on July 17, 2025,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1-21-8|Minecraft Java Edition 1.21.8|July 17, 2025}}</ref> which addresses various graphical and stability issues on certain devices.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-8-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.8 Release Candidate 1|July 15, 2025}}</ref> It is compatible with [[1.21.7]] servers.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.8 Release Candidate 1
|;From 1.21.5
|295947|The game screen freezes after a while on some Intel integrated graphics.
|296107|Entities and block entities become visually corrupted after a while on some Intel integrated graphics.
|296585|Flickering and other graphical corruption appears after summoning one or multiple {{cd|text_display}} entities on some Intel devices.
|296908|Text and texture atlases become visually corrupted after a while on some Intel integrated graphics.
|;From 1.21.6
|297784|Entities are shaded incorrectly after a while on Intel graphics of Gen11 architecture.
|298903|Items in the inventory can turn into a solid color and then disappear and text can render colored while on some Intel integrated graphics.
|298908|Items in the inventory are lit as if from the opposite direction on some Intel integrated graphics.
|299144|Crash with AMD graphics card when loading Resource Pack with invalid shader.
}}

== Trivia ==
*This is the first ''Java Edition'' 1.x.8 release since [[Java Edition 1.8.8|1.8.8]], which released in July 2015.
**It is also the fourth 1.x.8 release overall, following [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.8|Alpha v1.0.8]] (2010), [[Java Edition 1.7.8|1.7.8]] (2014) and [[Java Edition 1.8.8|1.8.8]] (2015).
